items.when_used: You activate the clippers. It makes a loud buzzing sound as you use them!
items.name: Hair Clippers
items.description: Cordless Wahl hair clippers for pets or humans. The battery low light is blinking.

rooms.description:
A beautiful courtyard with flowers on both sides of the stone walkway. 
The walkway leads north. A billboard is in the distance.

Entrance to an old, musty-smelling mansion. Some people have entered, to never return. 
The door to the north is open. The courtyard is to your south and a foyer to your north. A chandelier hangs from the ceiling.

The foyer of the mansion. A staircase leads upstairs but it is dilapidated and unusable. Therefore, the only exits to the south and east. 
A strange breeze moves through the room. Eastward is a small room that looks like a library. A teddy bear lies on the floor with its hair shaved

An spooky, eerie library. You walked into this eerie library FROM the west. 
Another room is north. Books are rustling by themselves on a bookshelf.

You've found a hidden chamber! It's a small room that's barely the size of a closet. 
There's an old desk here. It looks like no one has sat at it in a LONG time.

A large dining room with a Mahogany wood table. 
A cute furry rabbit is on the table eating carrots.

Uh oh. You're on a giant plate, full of carrots! 
I think we need to go, NOW!
A laptop with a USB port
I feel like we've been here before - not quite an infinite loop but infinite...!

Align Headquarters. Professor Keith is here working on your architecture review requirements.
 "Great to see you!" he says. "Looks like you're ready to do your code walk!" 
There is an open pathway to the north.

Align Bridge. There's a whiteboard here. There are monitors here. Replaying all of YOUR successes, friends and encounters in Align.
You feel something wet on your face...I'm not crying - YOU'RE crying. (tears of joy).
A dimly lit room is to the north.

A large robot with lights flashing, humming a tune from a cartoon. You can't quite remember the song. 
There's a slot on it's front side it reads: 'Insert Here'

monsters.description: A peaceful, cute-looking teddy bear with its hair clipped sits on the floor
monsters.effects: A monster Teddy Bear growls at you! You cannot get past!
monsters.attack: hits you with soft, fluffy paws! You might sneeze!
monsters.name: Teddy Bear

monsters.description: Awww. A furry rabbit twitching its nose and eating a carrot. Makes you want to pet him
monsters.effects:
A monster Rabbit moves towards you! He's blocking the way north. 
I think you might be dinner!
monsters.attack: licks you with a giant tongue!
monsters.name: Rabbit

puzzles.effects:
Books are rustling by themselves on the bookshelf. That's a weird bookshelf. Really weird.
You hear a voice whisper: "~Find Even Numbers Only~" 
Yikes. That's creepy. Maybe we should leave?
puzzles.name: MOD-SPOOKY-VOICE
puzzles.description:
An spooky, eerie library. You walked into this eerie library FROM the west. 
Another room is north. Books are rustling by themselves on a bookshelf.

puzzles.effects: It's dark! You cannot see anything! Maybe we should go back?
puzzles.name: DARKNESS

puzzles.effects:
This is a quiet living room. 
The dining area is to your south and another room to your east but there seems to be an invisible barrier blocking you from going in that direction. 
A dimly lit laptop is on a small table in the corner
puzzles.name: USB
puzzles.description: A laptop with a USB port

puzzles.effects:
Every time you move, you end up in the same room!
Something is etched into the wall with a knife. It says: 'Provide a solution to end the recursive madness'
puzzles.name: RECURSION-PUZZLE
puzzles.description: I feel like we've been here before - not quite an infinite loop but infinite...!

puzzles.effects:
This room is pretty much empty, except for a large robot in the corner, making a humming sound. 
It's annoying! Turn it off!
There's a slot on it's front side it reads: 'INSERT TICKET HERE'
puzzles.name: ROBOT
puzzles.description:
A large robot with lights flashing, humming a tune from a cartoon. You can't quite remember the song. 
There's a slot on it's front side it reads: 'Insert Here'
